name: US Euro Train Simulator 3D
description:
TIPS:

- Don't let crash your train
- Avpid obstacles to enjoy all missons
- Get exciting rewards after completing all levels
- Stop train at every termianl for passengers transportation


3D Scenes:

- Forest
- River Side
- Snow Falling




How to play:

~ Tap race button to drive train simulator
~ Tap left and right button to move left and right
~ Tap horn button to save yourself from other trains


Features:

- Multiple railway tracks
- Many game play modes
- 3D camera views
- Smooth train driving controls
